about_the_game:
Bloody Pigs a top down roguelite survivor shooter with procedural generation and endless coming to your home PC. Never has your 19 inches CRT screen looked this good. Blood Pigs pushes the technology into a new decade. Not only that but the game generates new levels, characters and stories with each playthrough. The game is so difficult that nobody will ever beat it. It’s made to crush your spirit and taint your soul.

It takes place in a future where hogs are the primary species and technology has advanced to a state where we have laser weapons and plasma technology. With the temper of a hog the stage is set for a blood bath and an after taste of vengeance.

Features

Paint the walls with volumetric blood and gore
It wouldn’t be a real game if it didn’t encourage real life violence. Not only that but realistic physics ensure death bodies and props to be impacted by the player and weapons.
Intense action packed gameplay
With a variation of guns and melee weapons. Utilize a strategy to overpower your enemies in tight corridors. The gameplay in uncompromised and intense.
High fidelity 3D graphics fully textured with the power of VooDoo GFX.
We all know good games are only as good as their graphics. That’s why this game features the best graphics.

Only for the hardcore !

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence's and themes around mental illness.
